long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform Your New Tab with Stunning Nature Photos and Customizable Features!

Discover the ultimate new tab experience with breathtaking nature photos and extensive customization options. Key features include:

- Beautiful Nature Photos: Enjoy rotating nature photos with each new tab.
- Custom Backgrounds: Change to a custom API, solid color, gradient, or upload your own images.
- Search: Use the Zap Surfer search a privacy search engine based on open source project searxng.
- Useful Tools: date/time display, and drag-and-drop editable shortcuts.
- Helpful Toolbar: Quick access to search, shopping, news, weather, documents, calculator, unit converter, clock, games, and themes.
- Language Options: Choose from 10 languages: Arabic, German, English, Spanish, French, Hindi, Japanese, Portuguese, Vietnamese, and Chinese.
- Advanced Customization: Fade background images over time, apply blur effects, and adjust luminosity.
- Customizable Widgets: Personalize widgets to suit your needs.
